com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility

Class StationSearchRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest<T>
      • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractListRequest<StationSearchResult>
        • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest

  • public final class StationSearchRequest
extends AbstractListRequest<StationSearchResult>
    Represents a request to search stations within certain radius by name, geo-coordinates or IDs. Note that all setter methods return current instance so these calls can be nicely chained.

    IMPORTANT: Urban Mobility Transit Station Search is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StationSearchRequest.NameMatchingMethod
      Possible matching methods for a station name.

      • setRadius

        @Deprecated
public StationSearchRequest setRadius(float radius)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use StationSearchRequest.setRadius(int) instead.
        Set the station search radius in meters.
        Parameters:
        radius - search radius in meters
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setRadius

        public StationSearchRequest setRadius(int radius)
        Set the station search radius in meters. It is 500 by default.
        Parameters:
        radius - search radius in meters, must be greater than or equal 0
        Returns:
        this request instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if radius is invalid.

      • setStationDetailsReturned

        @Deprecated
public StationSearchRequest setStationDetailsReturned(boolean details)
        Deprecated. This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use StationSearchRequest.setRequestStationDetailsEnabled(boolean) instead.
        Set if station details (e.g. lines running through the station) should be returned.
        Parameters:
        details - true if station details should be returned
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setRequestStationDetailsEnabled

        public StationSearchRequest setRequestStationDetailsEnabled(boolean details)
        Set if station details (e.g. lines running through the station) should be returned. It is true by default.
        Parameters:
        details - true if station details should be returned, false otherwise
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setStationNameMatchingMethod

        public StationSearchRequest setStationNameMatchingMethod(StationSearchRequest.NameMatchingMethod method)
        Set the matching method for station names when searching with name filter. It is FUZZY by default.
        Parameters:
        method - matching method
        Returns:
        this request instance

        public StationSearchRequest setMaximumResults(int maxResults)
        Description copied from class: AbstractListRequest
        Sets the maximum number of results to be returned in the response. It is not set by default.
        Overrides:
        setMaximumResults in class AbstractListRequest<StationSearchResult>
        Parameters:
        maxResults - number of results in response, must be greater than 0
        Returns:
        this request instance
